en.title: **Personal Projects**
en.text:
Even without formal work experience, Iâ€™ve worked on multiple personal projects that helped me develop a deep understanding of backend and frontend technologies. Below are some highlights:

  • Portfolio Website: Built a personal portfolio website showcasing my skills, achievements, and projects. Developed with React, Tailwind CSS, and deployed on Vercel.
  • Blog Application: Created a blog app that allows users to post, comment, and like articles. Utilized React for frontend and Firebase for backend data storage and authentication.

These projects reflect my skills in web development, problem-solving, and my commitment to continuous learning.
